mapper.select: select * from board where isDel = 'N' order by num desc limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content) values(#{board.title}, #{board.writer},#{board.content})
mapper.update: update board set title = #{board.title}, content = #{board.content}, isDel = #{board.isDel}, delDate = #{board.delDate}, views = #{board.views} where num = #{board.num}
